word:
THE POINT THAT ELLEN WHITE CONSIDERS 
     WITH ROSE IS ONE THAT EVERY GIRL MIGHT 
     SERIOUSLY THINK ABOUT--"LISTEN TO NO 
     PROMISES." THE ISSUE OF SPIRITUAL COMMITMENT IS 
     BEST SETTLED BEFORE MARRIAGE, NOT AFTER. AS 
     SUGGESTED IN THIS LETTER--"IT IS A LIFE OR 
     DEATH QUESTION." 
                                                                           83
